output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)

library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(readr)
library(janitor)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)

amzn <- read_xlsx("amzn_income.xlsx") %>%
  clean_names()
```

```{r}
amzn %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = date)) +
  geom_bar(aes(y = net_product_sales, fill = "products"), stat = "identity") 
```

```{r}
amzn %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = date))+
  geom_bar(aes(y = net_service_sales, fill = "services"), stat = "identity") 
```

```{r}
amzn %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = date)) + 
  geom_histogram(aes(y = total_net_sales, fill = "total sales"), stat = "identity")
```

```{r}
amzn %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = date)) + 
  geom_histogram(aes(y = net_income, fill = "net income"), stat = "identity")
```
```{r}
amzn %>%
  select(date, net_product_sales:total_net_sales, net_income, net_product_sales_yoy:total_net_sales_yoy) %>%
  kable() %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = "striped") 
  
```
